review_text: Easy to access and very clean. Cute little apartment for a weekend stay. Close to shops, restaurants, etc. in SOMA.
This place was awesome! Exactly like the listing and super clean in a walkable area with lots to do. I would definitely stay again!
Very nice place to stay. It was perfect for our weekend trip.
Decent location but you should plan on having a vehicle if you want to really see the city!
Cozy space. I like the cool bathroom faucet.
Nice place reminds me if newyork i dont know why lol
Nice neighborhood and people walking! Dog park is really nice
Stephanie’s place is great, old house with lots of character!!! Quiet comfortable stay at a discounted price

We enjoyed the step back in time provided by the beautiful old house combined with all the modern amenities we expected from an Airbnb. Meeting Stephanie and Jason there as they were working on another apartment was special.

Stephanie's apartment is 100% as described, spacious, clean, nicely decorated and ideally located. The neighborhood is in the most beautiful part of Downton Little Rock, and restaurants and bars are within walking distance. Stephanie and Madison are helpful, courteous and flexible. So it was possible for me to check in earlier and the bikes provided for free are great for exploring Little Rock.
An unrestricted recommendation!

Such a cool apartment in a historic home - totally comfortable, spacious and with everything you might need in the kitchen! Loved the SoMa neighborhood as well, not a bad walk all the way over to the river even, and hosts were very welcoming and accommodating. Would be happy to stay again!
A spacious studio in a big old house. Easy parking and great location. Around the corner from SoMa, a great neighborhood with lots of restaurants, shops, etc.
Hands down one of the cutest places I’ve stayed at! Very easy to check in and out, wish I could have stayed longer.
Great location and walkable neighborhood.

It was very refreshing in the area, and inside the home as well. I stayed upstairs in bed #3 and everything was clean. I only spoke with Jason for a few minutes since I arrived early and he was welcoming and explained everything to make sure I was comfortable. It was a peaceful experience and I enjoyed my stay.

I stayed at Stephanie's for only a night and that's probably the only sad part about my stay. My first thought when I checked in and dropped my bags off was that this was one of the best places I've stayed at using this platform. My room came with its own little kitchen and bathroom and both were extremely clean and pleasing to use. Things were extremely clean and the room even had a ton of pamphlets with local recommendations. I will use this place again if I ever find myself in Little Rock.

Stephanie's place was well worth it I felt right at home the minute I walked in their home was very comfortable very cozy very easy to call my own I would love to own a place like this I would recommend Stephanie's place for anybody it is a lovely and well worth the price
Great place to stay! I felt comfortable walking my dogs at night. I would stay there again!

Accommodations were perfect for our weekend here with a kitchen that had all the tools we needed, super easy street parking in front of the home, walking distance from multiple great restaurants in a hip up and coming area. There were other guests staying here when we were and the A/C unit was a great sound machine, so we couldn’t hear them. The apartment had awesome blackout curtains in the bedroom area that really helped keep the morning light out & the mattress was extremely comfortable! Loved being able to stay in a historic home and the vintage furniture was a great touch. We had a wonderful stay here and would love to come back if we are in the area.
Super cute and quaint! Loved it
love it here!
love this spot!

The place was clean, cozy, comfortable, and charming! We really loved staying here! It has the vibe of a New York City apartment or international hostel, with lots of character! The location is excellent! SoMa is a fun, vibrant area, with lots to see and do! Check-in & check-out was super easy, as well as parking. Thank you Stephanie for providing this lodging option! We’ll be back!
great spot!

The unit we stayed in was clean and was a great value for the price. It had a full kitchen and dinning area, the bathroom was a little small but the bedroom had a comfortable accent chair to relax in.
Great Location! Great Place! Great Price! Great Host!
Thank you Stephanie the stay was a delightful as it could be given the circumstances. 😊
We enjoyed our stay and were especially thankful we got to bring our dog along!
Another great stay. Both times we've been here we had horrible weather, (snowstorm and tornados) but always felt safe and taken care of by the hosts.
Great value for a cozy two night stay! Love the amenities like board games, bikes, etc.
Adorable home. Very well thought out and equipped for a short or long stay! Loved the chalk boards!

We enjoyed our stay very much! The room was very clean and the bed was very comfortable. It is in a great location as well, close to everything. The hosts were very accommodating and friendly. Will stay at again if we return to Little Rock in the future.

Nice apartment located in a decent area! I really enjoyed how close the apartment was to restaurants. I felt safe walking my dog late at night when I arrived in the neighborhood.
The space was very nice and clean, definitely as others have mentioned be aware before booking that the walls are pretty thin so quiet guests would probably be most favorable. The hosts were very quick to respond to questions I had which I appreciated!
Our second stay there. We will be back again!
It was a lovely place to stay! I was able to walk to dinner. The bed was comfy and the room was clean.

Was passing through on a road trip with my dog and had never stayed in Arkansas before. I was pleasantly surprised with the welcoming energy and surrounding neighborhood at Stephanie’s! You can tell she put a lot of thought into the space. It doesn’t feel like a random bleek home that is only used for rentals. Privacy was not an issue and the check in was a breeze. I even asked to stay 30 minutes longer because I was enjoying myself so much and didn’t want to hop back on the road….i would love to return in the future!

Stephanie and Jason were responsive, kind and I never actually met them, but their communication made me feel at home. They communicated clearly and let a bit of humor shine through. Their place was lovely, private. As a single woman I always have to be extra careful about safety and I felt perfectly safe my entire stay. Thank you both! I would stay again :-)
Great, quiet place. Perfect for my overnight stay with my dog. Clean & cute! 100% recommend to anyone looking for a place to stay!
Snug little place that was perfect for a quick night layover. Thank you!
Great location and great host. There is no huge pre-checkout cleaning list which is so rare lately. Very thankful for that! Everything was clean, cozy, and quiet. We will definitely be back.

Huge old house in a residential neighborhood but just a couple of blocks away from restaurants, bakeries, ice cream and lots of boutiques. We felt very safe walking around there. Kitchen is pretty dated and bathroom is small but both were clean and had all you need. Comfy bed, overall good value. Really like the entrance with the wooden bench and staircase and just an overall welcoming vibe.

Wonderful little place to stay with lots to do nearby! The building is charming, perfectly clean upon arrival, and there was no long list of tasks for guests to do before checking out, which is rare to encounter these days.
We loved the character and charm of this place and the host are amazing. Great food close by. Would definitely recommend this rental.
Great little spot to spend the night while on a roadtrip. Thanks!
Great deal, near all the restaurants and shops, perfect for a single traveler with their pups!
I only stayed one night, but it was great! Location is perfect!
Great place.

Absolutely loved Stephanie’s place. It is a cute apartment with a great bedroom, kitchen and bathroom. Stephanie was easy to communicate with. Very responsive. Lots of recommendations of things to do in the area and in the city. Safe neighborhood and easy parking. Wish I had more time to spend here.
Great location and price. Perfect for an overnight in Little Rock and close to where I wanted to spend time.

It was great - super easy to get to, get in, I liked how they allow dogs on the bed but also said "please use old bedsheet on top of bed," (but of course). Bonus? Cornbread Festival was going on the wkd I was there and totally walkable from the AirBnB, lol! I would def stay again on my next pass thru Little Rock.
Very comfy bed and nice neighborhood for walking our dogs. We checked in late and left early, so all we did was sleep. It was just fine for what we needed!

What a great find! I stayed only one night however I was able to walk to the river in 20 mins which has a lovely river walk. Nice and quiet and slept so good on the bed. Will stay here again if the opportunity arises.

The place was just what we needed for a weekend stopover in Little Rock. So close to south main - which has cute coffee shops, restaurants, and boutiques. Extremely walkable. We stayed during a particularly rainy weekend in Little Rock, but took the opportunity to walk around when it slowed down.
Stephanie as a host was extremely responsive. Instructions for checkin and check out were so easy!!
easy check-in, and the area was great.
Awesome place!!
the bed was heavenly!!
Awesome as usual! I think this is my 4th time staying here will very likely stay again
Charming building and neighborhood. I was with my pup, so it was nice to be walking distance to the dog park and places to eat and drink. Definitely would stay here again if I’m back in town!
Great affordable spot with a super welcoming host.

Absolutely wonderful place! Stephanie was a very considerate host! I got there very early and she had recommendations of where I could go with my dog while I waited for the apartment to be cleaned. The apartment (#3) was very lovely and cozy. We really liked the layout. This apartment is within walking distance (2-3 blocks) of the main street with all the restaurants and the distillery. The neighborhood felt very safe and the local residents were very friendly. I am looking forward to staying there again.

My room was clean and nicely decorated. The bed was comfortable. It was nice to have a kitchen with a full-size refrigerator with ice trays in the freezer. The lock on the door was easy to get open. I enjoyed sitting on the front porch.
Cool house in a great neighborhood. Walking distance to some great restaurants and the distillery. Stephanie was easy to communicate with, and check-in was seamless. Would stay here again.
Excellent stay in a lovely space! Perfect for exploring the surrounding area — so many restaurants/shops/cafes in walking distance. Comfortable and secure. Can’t wait to return — highly recommended!

We had a wonderful stay here. The apartment was perfect for our needs and was a really good size for us both and was very clean. The location was great and it was easy to walk to nearby restaurants/grocery stores and downtown. Our hosts were very accommodating and responsive throughout our stay.
Will definitely be back next time I am in town!
We had a great time staying here! Perfect little get away apartment!
Very good stay for a quick night in town!
Cute neighborhood and beautiful apartment. Super easy to get into and very clean, I would absolutely stay here again!

Totally recomendable :)
The place was perfect, I could stay longer there. I was there for 3 nights and I felt very good. The place was very welcoming, all clean and comfortable. The bed was perfect to rest and you have all you need in the kitchen.
A supermarket is close even walking and there are many places a short distance, so you feel like at home. I knew that there were other apartments in the same home but I we never see each other I felt a good privacy.
Excellent communication with Stephanie.
Thank you !
Was what I needed for the night. Bed was super comfortable, check in was a breeze
Loved this stay! The place was super cute and quaint. Hosts are very responsive and supportive! Thank you for a lovely stay.
Absolutely great find!! Loved it. So did my four legged companion and honestly one of the more unique airbnbs I’ve been to. Highly recommend

I came back because the stay was fantastic! I and my daughter enjoyed it for many days. I'm a stickler for quietness and peace. I had an amazing Stay! I will recommend to anyone traveling here to Little Rock. They generally give you everything you may need and better than a hotel. Yasssss!! This place will not disappoint you if your seeking. The skyline out the windows is my favorite because I love trees and loved 👀 seeing the Monarch land on the window as I cooked. Being able to cook, and have essentials like pots, pans, access to a refrigerator, most of all a coffee pot makes all the difference in the world for awaking early morning. Being able to open the kitchen window in Apt #4, was truly unique. I love hearing outside noise and it was my highlight. I'll book it any day over a hotel if your a more reserved person. I am!
Best,
Kanisha
An older home and shows its age. The room, kitchen, bathroom, and all spaces were clean and well maintained. Nice location. We stayed for three nights and found the property to be well suited for us.

I enjoyed it so much, I felt like I was visiting a family member's home. Private, Peaceful and very chill. I and my daughter both familiar with the neighborhood because I once lived at 1400 Cumberland location over a year ago for 5 years, so I wanted to stay close to SOMA which is why I wanted a downtown location to relax in before I move back downtown area permanently again soon. Stephanie and Jason's place gave me those memories of living back downtown again. I grew up on Rock street 1 street over and have lived in downtown most of my entire life, and I felt right at home at this residence. I miss it so much being close to nearby restaurants, convenient grocery stores, and the entertainment district especially the Bernice Gardens, and my favorite Pizzeria Rad Uno. Thank you all for the experience and I look forward to lodging again. Never a dull moment living in downtown Little Rock, Arkansas.
Best,
Kanisha and Scarlet
Stephanie responded quickly to my questions, and even assisted me with a mistake I made while booking. The room was just as pictured and clean. I would definitely recommend.

I stay at Stephanie's place when I pass through Little Rock and it's always worth the stay! Very walkable neighborhood with shops and restaurants within 2-3 blocks from the house. Parking is very easy out front.
Great cozy stay! Definitely recommending friends and family stop, as it is a great half way point on the road trip from IL to TX. Thank you for the stay and for allowing fur babies into your home 💙
Beautiful stay! Definitely my favorite AIRBNB and we stay in them very often! Very clean and friendly host! Beautiful location!

Thanks so much Stephanie! The spot was perfect for us. Convenient and comfy. I wish we’d gotten in a little earlier to take better advantage of the local eateries. Though we did get a couple great sandwiches at the “membership “ bar/billiard spot. Perfect neighborhood walking for the dogs.
One of the nicest most unique stays I’ve had. Beautiful space in a great hip area

Great value. Perfect location. Super walkable neighborhood with beautiful houses, cute shops and several great restaurants. This was a long weekend for me and I brought along my dog. We had a great time and we’re able to rest in a good space.
I slept so well at Stephanie’s! I will definitely be returning!

Stephanie and her co-hosts were great! Very helpful and responsive. She came in person to resolve an issue which made our stay very comfortable. Being new to the area and not having done much research about the area, I didn’t know what to think of the area, but other than that very comfortable stay!

Stephanie's place was the perfect accommodation for our short stay in SoMa. We loved how dog friendly she and many of the local businesses are. We enjoyed Community Bakery Coffee, browsing in the Sunday Farmer's Market, The Root Cafe, and The Bark Bar. Wonderful location in a neat area of town! Thanks, Stephanie!
Right next to SoMa! Stephanie’s place was such a cool local experience. I loved the character of this house and that I had a private kitchen, bathroom, and bedroom in this cute old home!
We had a great stay! Everything was as described, and we had everything we needed!

We enjoyed Stephanie's place! The bed is really comfortable, and there are clear instructions for checking in/out and things to be aware of during your stay. We loved how close it was to restaurants (less than a 5 minute walk), and we enjoyed checking out some of the local spots nearby.
Thank you for letting me stay here! It was perfect for the short visit with relatives.
Super convenient and cozy place! It did get a little hot with only the window units, but otherwise I had a wonderful stay.
Absolutely lovely stay & Stephanie and Jason could not have been nicer. Would definitely stay at their home again!!

We enjoyed our stay in this bnb. We felt right at home. Stephanie was so nice and let us check in an hour early. We loved the atmosphere of the old house. There were a lot of recommendations on the magazines that she provided by the door! The place is close to a lot of nice restaurants and the museum! She responded right away whenever we asked a question and was always very accommodating. There was construction going on which was actually helpful for us so we can wake up and explore early! Haha! Would 100% recommend this bnb to anyone I know :)

place is kind of funky and eclectic. a fun place to stay. very convenient to downtown and the rest of Little Rock. the apartment was cozy and clean. and the chalkboard in the kitchen ( you just have to see it to understand) was a fun addition.
Clean and decent place for the price
Great stay! A good location with lots of things to do a quick walk away. Very clean and cozy space. Would stay again when in Little Rock!

This was a charming apartment in what seemed like a safe neighborhood. We were on a long car trip, and did not feel like fully unpacking the car, and it was fine on street parking in front of the home. There were renovations happening, but they weren't a bother at all.
The host provided detailed information on the area, which was very helpful.
The bed and provided linens were very comfortable. Absolutely would stay again.
Awesome listing! Would definitely recommend! Hosts we’re definitely accommodating. Property is located right by any local business you might need.
Very reasonably priced. Easy access to downtown.

Nice and cozy place with a nice little kitchen. Best part is that it’s near a Main Street with good food and a farmers market. Had a great time walking my pup around the neighborhood too. Will be coming back in the future!
Thanks so much

This is a great place in a lovely neighbourhood with easy access to downtown and other spots around the city. I really liked the place with had a warm and cozy vibe and Stephanie was attentive and easy to communicate with.
While all that was great, there was some pretty intensive construction going on at the house at the time which woke me up pretty early each morning. Moreover, I couldn't get to the laundry without stepping on discarded roof tiles littered with bent nails, which was not a pleasant experience.

It was a great place to stay. Very old building with lots of history and character! Stephanie was very quick to respond to my request to book and followed up to all my questions immediately. I will definitely stay again the next time I’m in the area!

I perhaps missed this in the description, but I didn’t realize the apartment was on the second floor. Because I’m taking a long trip, I have a cool chest and food along with me in addition to my suitcase and my dog. This was a lot of carrying up and down the stairs for me. Being an older person, that made it harder. Perhaps they could mention that. I can see that they’re renovating the house, so there is a lot of construction material in the hallways, and in the apartment.
Cool place and great location! We will try and stay here if we ever return to Little Rock!
Responsive host, easy check in. 5 stars.

Stephanie was kind and very responsive.
The space was beautiful and was within walking distance to downtown. Stephanie also provided bikes and the river trail is a great space to bike.
Stephanie is a fantastic host!!!
Beautiful place and Stephanie is an amazing host!! Planning on moving to LR and she helped us out a lot with local places and job opportunities 🙂
Great and clean place!

This was a great find for a last minute stop to break up a longer drive. We didn't get to experience it as part of a longer trip to Little Rock, but with the detail and level of information provided by Stephanie as well as the location, I imagine a longer stay would have been great. Especially love how pet friendly it was-it's not always easy for us to find a place that will allow all 3 of our dogs. Also really appreciated the thoughtfulness: having a white noise machine? Genius.

What a great place and amazing hosts! Clean, comfortable, dog friendly, and safe location.  Everything you would need for a trip. Short walking distance to some great restaurants, dog park, museums, and more.
I was able to make this reservation the morning of our stay! Such a lovely place with lovely hosts. Communication was great. Would stay here again.
Had a great stay at Stephanie's place. It's a comfortable studio that's easily walkable to lots of restaurants, a nice park, etc. Would happily stay here again next time I'm in the area!
I loved it. Very cute and comfortable

The location was great for walkable restaurants, bars, and access to things to do. In my opinion, it was a central location. The apartment served my needs as far as a comfortable place to stay. Kitchen was nicely stocked with cookware and serving utensils and you could cook your own meals. The house guide was very helpful and informative.
It was a lovely stay! It’s in walking distance to the Main Street with all the restaurants, so you can take pets on a nice walk. The apartment was clean and I felt safe!

Close to grocery store, restaurants and pharmacy. Quiet neighborhood.
Owner very serviceminded and easy to get in touch with. Also Jason is very friendly and serviceminded. I would come back anytime

This is a great little place for one or two people. You’ll actually be surprised how big it is inside. The kitchen is quite spacious with a long hallway, leading to the bed. The bathroom is small but that’s to be expected from an old building. It’s really close to restaurants and cafés. You must go to the Root cafe for breakfast. There are also some bars just down the street. The people in the area seem to be friendly. I actually got into a two hour conversation with a couple on the street while walking my dog. I would definitely stay here again so I could explore the city more.

This is the third year in a row ive stayed here and each time its super easy to check in, people are really nice and the host are responsive. Ill be back next year again for sure!
Love this place

You’re only two blocks away from a great selection of restaurants and stores but the place itself is remarkably quiet and homey. The full kitchen with a full-sized table was great to have. Even during an extreme cold snap the suite was toasty warm.

It is a very nice and comfortable place. A large and older home that has many interesting attributes from the front porch to the beautiful old staircase in a neighborhood of similar older homes. Thank you for hosting my stay.
This was a great little place to stay, just a couple blocks from South Main. Great value, and highly recommend!
This was the cutest place ever. We honestly kept saying to ourselves how this is like our dream home! Loved it! Quaint, quiet, adorable, charming
Excellent!
Very comfortable and cozy bed and linens. Easy access. Coffee included with all the kitchen stuff. Nice towels.

Stephanie's place is awesome! It's a two-block walk to Main St where there are cute shops and restaurants. It's a pretty nice, walkable neighborhood in general; definitely great for walking my pup! The space itself was wonderful and the bed and pillows were very comfortable. Check-in was a breeze and I'd highly recommend this place to anyone coming through Little Rock!

A very quiet, safe and walkable place to stay, but know it is not the most updated home. However, it has what you need for a clean and cozy stay - plenty of fresh towels, good water pressure in shower, comfortable bed, cooking amenities, shampoo/conditioner, soap, lotion, tissues, etc. It's a great place to stay for a few nights for one or 2 people as it is a tight space. As mentioned, it is an older home so quiet guests are best as you don't want to be hearing other conversations, music, etc. from the other rooms. I will say the wifi didn't work great for the smart TV at night but that isn't a big deal if you don't plan to stay in the apartment most days. No drinking water provided, but luckily I had brought my own. There was also no dish soap to wash the few dirty dishes I had (hope that wasn't a pain on my hosts!). I really liked the place overall and felt right at home. I would stay here again for sure!

Stephanie’s listing is very accurate and it was a perfect stay for us in a big old house with lots of room and character. We brought our bikes and we’re easily able to store them inside the house. The location made it easy to get around town. Too bad we only had the one night to enjoy Little Rock.
Clean place in a great location! We really enjoyed being able to stay here with our dog.

Fantastic location! One block over from everything SoMa has to offer. The house is super cute, and had all the amenities I needed for a week's stay. Both the other tenants and the neighborhood were quiet and I felt safe. Would definitely recommend
Great stay! Would love to come again!
Great location, walking distance to The Root Cafe and other nice restaurants, Plus easy access to the highway for traveling to North or West Little Rock.
Highly recommend to anyone staying in Little Rock. Wonderful hosts, great location, place has everything you need and more!
Perfect little stop on our road trip to Nashville. Great location and beautiful house.
Lovely place in a safe neighborhood. Highly recommend!

Very sweet hosts and gorgeous Victorian home! Affordable and unique. I love that it hasn’t had a Home Depot makeover, and remains classic. I wish more older homes stayed this way!
Would definitely come back, thank you:)
If you’re looking for a quick getaway spot in Little Rock, this is the place to go cozy, quiet, discreet, located near downtown. What more could you ask for?

My mom, dog and I stayed here very last minute on our roadtrip cross country and we loved it! Super quaint and plenty of space for us. The place was clean, well organized, and had everything we needed for the night.
Beautiful home and beautiful location! Loved this part of town and all the eateries around. Was super happy with my stay and thought the home itself had so much charm.
This stay is perfect - close to everything, clean, spacious, and comfortable!!
Great place - well located, clean, and comfortable!

Stephanie’s place was perfect for a short stay! Everything was comfortable and the studio had everything needed. Stephanie was quick to communicate, accommodating, and friendly. Location was central and parking was a breeze. I would definitely stay again!

Such a cute little place, in the heart of everything! Check in and out was a breeze! So clean and well kept! The bed was so comfortable and the space, just perfect! It was a last minute booking, and they had everything ready and perfect and waiting for us, in record time!! 10/10!!!
Great location. Studio was perfect for a quick weekend
Great time. Unique place

The place was perfect. We need a place to get a good night of sleep before continuing our Road Trip, and I got exactly that. The bed is comfortable, the room temperature was on point, and the place is so quiet. I would definitely stay there again.
This was a great place to stay in Little Rock. We were just stopping through for a night, but would gladly have stayed here longer if need be. Definitely recommend.
Awesome stay!
This space was perfect for us and our pups to rest up to get back on the road home. Home was clean and bed was comfy. We highly recommend this place!

Very clean, I love the vintage/ antique vibe it gives off, great place for our pups since there’s a dog park nearby, the bed was very comfortable, overall it was a comfy place and we definitely recommend it!
A wonderful stay as always!
This was a great place to stay! It was clean, inviting, and just a short walk from local restaurants.
Nice, quiet, and close to a lot of things. couldn't be more happy with my stay. Extremely cozy. Would love to stay here again next time I'm in town.
The room I stayed in was perfect. Very comfortable bed, well stocked kitchen and bathroom. The location was ideal for what I needed.

A fabulous old home in a beautiful historic neighborhood ... nothing could be better. The studio was perfection, with truly the most comfortable bed I've ever slept in. The sunny kitchen provided a cheery workspace, and everything I could possibly need was provided. If you are looking for a charming, quiet space to relax and explore, this is it!
This old house has lots of character! I enjoyed my stay, and the location is perfect, with lots of good restaurants close by. Thanks Stephanie!

Great place!
* In historic area and building
* Dog friendly with nearby park
* Grocery Store is 3 blocks
* Restaurants are close by and walking distance
* Kitchen is fully functional.
* Dog friendly bar/restaurants nearby

What an awesome find! The home has some amazing character and we loved the antique features (wood floors, art work, etc).
Just enough space to feel comfortable and rested for the trip.
Easy and great communication!

Stephanie’s place was lovely. While an older building, the decoration was nice and cozy. You had literally everything you could ask for in a short or long term stay. The neighborhood is really nice to walk around and it has a lot of things in a walking distance.
She was great at answering all my questions and pretty quick about it as well. I also appreciate that she was willing to host us with our two huge dogs while in our roadtrip cross country.
Don’t hesitate on choosing her place, you won’t regret it!
Comfortable and perfect for what we needed.
Absolutely loved staying here! Has everything you need, a great location and loved the older house.
Very well situated and quiet !!!
This place is awesome! I really enjoyed the whole vibe of this place. It was exactly as described and exactly what we needed. Easy parking, easy self check in.
Great stay, good location, and very affordable.
This Airbnb was excellent! The location was perfect - in walking distance of so many shops and restaurants. The Airbnb itself was also very cute with everything we could need.
Cute unit with a lot of character. Great location with cafes and bakeries within walking distance
Best Airbnb I've stayed in! Cozy, fully equipped with everything you need, and close to everything!
This apartment was great, spacious and comfy.
Very cozy and comfortable! Easy to check in. Good location close to SOMA. Super comfy bed with a nice smart tv to watch movies. Fully equipped kitchen and just overall cute place. Would stay again!
Great stay and value.
Great comfortable place in a quiet and peaceful neighborhood. Enjoyed my two week stay very much, thanks!
awesome place!
Wonderful place to stay. They are super responsive and the place is really nice. This was our second time staying here and we will definitely stay again

We loved our stay here! The room was very clean and super adorable! Parking was super easy and there were plenty of cool shops/restaurants close by to check out. This stay is definitely feels like a home away from home, with all the creature comfort’s you need. We’ll absolutely keep this place in mind next time we come to LR!
Great place, very comfortable and filled with character; great rate; great location...parking is easy, too.
Great location! I only stayed for the night but would've loved to stay longer and explore Little Rock
This is my third or fourth time staying here and I keep rebooking for a reason. It's a wonderful experience every time and the perfect stop for both me and my dog.
This was definitely one of my favorite Airbnbs of all time! It was so cozy and relaxing and a perfect place for the two of us! Would definitely stay here again and recommend to all of our friends!
Unique and quiet little place! Perfect for my overnight stay!
Amazing place, and great deal!
I really enjoyed my stay here, even though it was only for one night. The apartment was so cute and the hosts are accommodating and very nice!
Excellent accommodations in a beautiful building in a great area.

Stephanie’s space in Little Rock was so awesome! It is exactly as advertised on the listing. It was a very short drive from local hotspots! If you are passing through Little Rock, I highly recommend you stay with Stephanie.

Great location and great price! Stephanie was very nice and even let my dog play with hers which he enjoyed a lot! We were only in town for one night so we didn't get to explore the area much, but what we did see looked really fun!
Nice place to stay! Comfortable accommodations and in a great location.
Loved the room and the stay! Quiet neighborhood and very private.
Great location. Walking distance from some of our fave places. Very dog friendly. Be mindful of allergies, it’s a very old house. Hosts were communicative and accommodating.
Nice, comfy stay with all amenities. Would recommend to other guests and stay again!

Had such a lovely visit to Little Rock staying at Stephanie's place! My dog and I loved walking around the neighborhood. There is a beautiful park with outdoor art just around the corner, and multiple restaurants with amazing vegan food. Would definitely stay again if I find myself in Little Rock!
Cozy, private, and just what I needed to break up a long road trip. Thanks Stephanie!
Nice place and unique features. Well done.
This is a great place to stay, clean and very animal friendly. Great location and exactly what they say it is.

Very comfortable! We enjoyed our stay and all Little Rock has to offer. We found the provided information and brochures very helpful when deciding where to go and what to do. The house is beautiful and very comfortable. We didn't plan on coming to Little Rock but availability of flights made it necessary... It worked out great! There is so much to see and do. The next time we are headed to Memphis/Millington we will probably choose to fly into Little Rock. We visited 2 (of the 52!!!) State Parks and rode the trolley. We also visited Hot Springs National Park... hindsight we should have stayed all 3 nights in this house not one day in a Hot Springs airbnb. Definitely worth the commute back and forth to Hot Springs to be able to stay in such a comfortable place. Thank you, Angela!

The Historic Craftsman is my favorite Little Rock AirBnB. It offers comfortable furniture, a really good shower, ample closet space, and modern appliances. Angela communicates very well in timely fashion and I rate her as a great host.
